caption=Minstrel of Gondor from [[The Return of the King (1980 film)

column1: The '''Minstrel of [[Gondor]]''' is a character performed by [[Glenn Yarbrough]] who appears in the [[1980]] [[The Return of the King (1980 film)
column2: animated adaptation]] of ''[[The Return of the King (1980 film)
column3: The Return of the King]]''. He appears only in the film's framing device as entertainment at [[Bilbo Baggins]]' 129th birthday party in [[Rivendell]], and relates the tale of [[Frodo Baggins
column5: quest]] to destroy Bilbo's old [[The One Ring
column6: ring]], singing various songs in the process.
